history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. rewrite Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm b c). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm c d). srun best use: Rplus_le_compat.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall r r1 r2 : R, r1 + r <= r2 + r -> r1 <= r2" on hypothesis of type "b <= c".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?M1867 + (?M1868 + ?M1869)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c <= d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "d" with "a + c".

ctx: intros a b c d H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c, d : R H1 : a + c <= d H2 : b <= c Unable to unify "b <= c" with "a + c + b <= d + c".

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Rplus_le_reg_r with (r:=c) in H2. rewrite Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm b c). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. rewrite (Rplus_comm c d). rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. apply Rplus_le_compat_l. apply H2.
